Title: Hear me out: a friends pendant but with a google home form factor and the personality of a dog. You ...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Hear me out: a friends pendant but with a google home form factor and the personality of a dog. You get home from a long work day and it's like "master, master, master, it's so good to see you. How about a game of 20 questions? Maybe you'd like some music?"
